StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertMapSectors]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Orgrowguid UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,@Organiza.onType as varchar(3) = NULL ,@LastUpdateUserId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) AS
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM USMC.MapsSector WHERE MapsSector.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = @Orgrowguid) BEGIN --ONLY CREATE SECTORS IF THE ORGANIZATION IS AN RSS IF (@Organiza.onType = 'RSS' AND @Organiza.onType IS NOT NULL AND @LastUpdateUserId IS NOT NULL AND @Orgrowguid IS NOT NULL) BEGIN
CREATE TABLE #SECTORS ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,SectorDesignator VARCHAR(10) ,LastUpdateDate DATETIME ,LastUpdateUserId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ,SectorType CHAR(1) )
-- Hard code sectorType to "E" because this is only for RSS
INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'A', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'B', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'C', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'D', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'E', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'F', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'G', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E' INSERT INTO #SECTORS SELECT newid(), @Orgrowguid, 'H', getdate(), @LastUpdateUserId, 'E'
INSERT INTO RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSector SELECT ID ,Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId ,SectorDesignator ,LastUpdateDate ,LastUpdateUserId ,SectorType FROM #SECTORS
DROP TABLE #SECTORS END
END
